page.title: 16Cheadle & Tean Times
page.content: The Cheadle & Tean Times is the local Newspaper. It is known as 'The Stunner' & is published weekly on Thursdays for delivery on Fridays.Nicky Clarke collected the following information- On Friday we went to The Cheadle & Tean Times Office for the Domesday Project.We saw the Editorial Room & asked Mr.Campbell some questions. The paper is printed on Thursdays & has a circulation of 26,000.The presses are very old.They came from India,where they used to print the 'Bombay Times',that is why the quality is not always too good.They would cost 75,000 to replace.We met the Advertising Manager & he explained the importance of Adverts to the paper.We saw the Computers & Decoding Machine & finally the Dark Room.We had our photos taken & returned to School.
